QuestData.Title: Crusader Forward Camp
QuestData.Description: Crusader Dargath, Crusader MacKellar, Engineer Reed and the twins, Gerk and Burr, were sent to the Dead Fields to establish a battle front days ago. As of my last correspondence with them, they had successfully established a camp on the border of the Dead Fields, northwest of here.$B$BIn light of this newfound information about Drakuru and Prince Navarius I think it would be prudent to send someone to the Crusader Forward Camp post-haste.$B$BPack up your belongings, $n. You must leave at once!
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Crusader MacKellar at the Crusader Forward Camp in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.RewardText: Everything was fine until the Scourge attacked. They took off with Dargath, Gerk and Burr and they also destroyed our ride. Guess who led that attack?$B$B<MacKellar nods.>$B$BNavarius...$B$BSeems this whole area is some type of factory for Scourge. We're in the middle of a damned undead mine field!
